channel.title: Can any add the npc to this map [Lumbridge]
channel.description:
[img]https://encrypted-tbn2.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTKVKjHcKNj0DZm3UEHqx200YDJsR1Ji728XZwALdz7JUFaW776[/img] I'm trying to remake some of the famous places of runescape back during this period and would like to know the npcs locations such as goblins exc it would be helpful, so thanks for your help
example of how detailed -how many goblins in a area -where the men npcs spawn location
stuff like that would be helpful or if you can lead me to a site that has all this information it would be great

item.title: Can any add the npc to this map [Lumbridge]

item.title: Can any add the npc to this map [Lumbridge]
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

tyb97:

Well you’ve got Hans inside the gates, a man and a woman south of castle by the buildings. About 5 goblins south of the cows… Excuse me if I’m confusing revisions.

thanks for your help but i found a online server of remake of 2006

Read full topic

item.title: Can any add the npc to this map [Lumbridge]
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

heatrn11:

Doesn’t have to be exact as long as they’re around the correct area.

Thanks, but i would like to to be accurate or ill be so over it. I would like just a general picture of where they spawn at I can’t find any videos on the old lumbridge

Read full topic
